nodes.text: The Naboo crest headdress was a type of headdress worn by the Naboo. While fleeing Coruscant after an assassination attempt, Padmé Amidala wore a Naboo crest covered with a veil; she wore it uncovered once she reached Naboo. The piece was made of orichalc metal with a flower of life emblem design.

In 34 ABY, decades after Amidala's death in 19 BBY, Naboo crest headdresses of the same design as Amidala's were sold at Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities, operated by Dok-Ondar in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.
